Button.Name: Calc
Button.OnPress: Temp=Parent.ts+(Parent.t10s*10) Time=Temp+(Parent.tm*60) Parent.Timer=Time Temp=Time*Parent.Parent.CorrectionFactor Time=Temp/60.000 hos=0-Time*30 ho10s=30-Time*6 hom=30-Time ho18m=30600-Time*30 ho17m=28800-Time*30 ho16m=27000-Time*30 ho15m=25200-Time*30 ho14m=23400-Time*30 ho13m=21600-Time*30 ho12m=19800-Time*30 ho11m=18000-Time*30 ho10m=16200-Time*30 ho9m=14400-Time*30 ho8m=12600-Time*30 ho7m=10800-Time*30 ho6m=9000-Time*30 ho5m=7200-Time*30 ho4m=5400-Time*30 Parent.Loc1s=hos ## ",0" timer_test=ho10s >= 0 Parent.vs=timer_test Parent.v10s= ! timer_test Parent.Loc10s=(timer_test ? "0,0" : ho10s ) ## ",0" timer_test=hom >= 0 temp=Parent.vs Parent.vs=(timer_test ? temp : false ) temp=Parent.v10s Parent.v10s=(timer_test ? temp : false ) Parent.vm= ! timer_test Parent.Loc1m=(timer_test ? "0,0" : hom ) ## ",0" timer_test=ho18m >= 0 Parent.Loc18m=(timer_test ? "0,0" : ho18m ) ## ",0" timer_test=ho17m >= 0 Parent.Loc17m=(timer_test ? "0,0" : ho9m ) ## ",0" timer_test=ho8m >= 0 Parent.Loc8m=(timer_test ? "0,0" : ho8m ) ## ",0" timer_test=ho7m >= 0 Parent.Loc7m=(timer_test ? "0,0" : ho4m ) ## ",0" temp=Parent.vm Parent.vm=(timer_test ? temp : false ) Parent.v15m= ! timer_test Parent.Start.Text=Parent.lm ## Colon ## Parent.l10s ## Parent.ls Parent.Option.Timer.Text=Parent.Start.Text hoa=hos+Parent.ta*30 timer_test=hoa >= 0 Parent.Loca=(timer_test ? "0,0" : hoa ) ## ",0" Parent.Parent.Options.DefaultText.Press=true
